column4: Are there any limitations on what I can do to files on a Windows file share from Ubuntu?
I want to create an intranet for our Active Directory based network, and want to make sure I can interact with windows server shares from Ubuntu
there's not many things you need to do, open/delete/execute/delete files.. all works, there might be some permission issues, and case sensitivity can be an issue
ndube: thanks, that's what I thought but wanted to make sure
